description: {"blocks":[{"key":"cmrh4","text":"This protocol has been successfully used with colonial tunicates. It has been adapted to our needs based on the following publication: \" MicroCT for comparative morphology: simple staining methods allow high-contrast 3D imaging of diverse non-mineralized animal tissues \" by Brian D Metscher. steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8ka9t","text":"Clean the slide with the colony of your interest. {"blocks":[{"key":"fdotv","text":"Fix the animals in 4% PFA   at   . See Whole colony fixation V.1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":31,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":39,"length":25}],"data":{}},{"key":"dls4t","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"guid":"9D7E05DB7AB211EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"duration":0,"error_temperature":false,"guid":"9D7E06747AB211EC897E0A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":["overnight"],"scientificNotation":false,"start":null,"temperature":"","unit":32}},"2":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"121832C0801F11EC9028EDD2465EAFEE","url":"http://dx.doi.org/10.17504/protocols.io.bru4m6yw"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3k9v","text":"Rinse tree times with 1x PBS and leave in 1x PBS for   .\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":53,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"25ke3","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":3600,"guid":"064CE4C07AB311EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"at9gl","text":"Detach the colony with a razor blade and put in a 2mL tube containing    PTA /   IKI/    Ethanol. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":71,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":78,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":86,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7s0jj","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"67BBFA707AB311EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.6","error":false,"guid":"6FE361707AB311EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"0.4","error":false,"guid":"78F3C8E07AB311EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9c5nn","text":"Incubate for    at    on linear shaker (low speed), protect from light.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":13,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":19,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1uoa8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"duration","mutability":"","data":{"duration":345600,"guid":"C8B4CEB07AB311EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","pause":null,"preset":[],"start":null}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"D2A954907AB311EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":32}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4um3","text":"Place the tip into a beaker filled with ice-cubes so that the agarose becomes solid. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c7fau","text":"Store at   or proceed to the next step. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":9,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7he82","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"75556FA07AB711EC88A3E5B68B7F1805","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bogan","text":"Mount the tip on the tomograph support using fixing paste in such way that it is perfectly straight.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4ouqr","text":" Follow the tomograph's manual and proceed to scan.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2np83","text":"When the agarose has cooled down a bit, pipette   if using a 200ul tip or    if using a 1mL tip (the tip size depends on the animal size).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":48,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":74,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b3v1a","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"125-150","error":false,"guid":"8A447A70802D11ECBC1C032EDA5F6AD4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"750-800","error":false,"guid":"9ED49BA0802D11ECBC1C032EDA5F6AD4","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fqh0p","text":"Carefully place your colony vertically inside the tip (it should be as flat as possible, avoid folds).   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"65iv3","text":"Pipette some more agarose in order to cover the animal entirely.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ddu0o","text":"After scanning, the tip with the sample can be stored at   for several weeks and eventually can be reused.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":57,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"6bet7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"8CED4690801D11EC9028EDD2465EAFEE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"4","unit":10}}}}

title: X-ray Micro Computed Tomography (MicroCT)
